text: Sergei Pavlovich Orlov (; born 17 March 1974, in Volgograd) is a Russian football coach and a former player. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Sportspeople from Volgograd Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Mordovia Saransk players Category:Russian football managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Sergei Orlov (footballer, born 1974)
